```{r setup, include = FALSE}
options(stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
options("width" = 110)

### Load packages and functions
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(sessioninfo)
library(gt)
library(knitr)


### Set knitr rmarkdown chunk options
output_directory <- file.path(params[["working_directory"]], params[["script_name"]])
dir.create(path = output_directory, recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE, mode = "0755")
opts_chunk$set(
  results = "asis",
  include = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  dpi = params[["dpi"]],
  tidy = FALSE,
  crop = TRUE,
  autodep = TRUE,
  fig.align = "center"
)


### Define theme
theme_set(theme_light(base_size = params[["gg_fontsize"]]))
```
